pr_title: Fix reset partition error when restarting a stopped replica

timeline.message:
Fix reset partition error when restarting a stopped replica

Previous code assumes stopped replica is in error state (this is true if replica is stopped and machine is rebooted).
However, if there is no reboot between stopping and starting same replica, its state should stay unchanged (i.e.
STANDBY). Helix current doesn't support resetting partition from STANDBY (only ERROR state is allowed). Hence, this
PR will check if the stopped replica is in ERROR state and decide whether to reset the partition.
Also, since leader based replica is introduced, this PR adds logic to disable replica when stopping a replica (to
trigger state transistion and potential leader election).
